name: Pathfinder Puzzle
description:
Traing your Brain with Pathfinder Puzzle

In Pathfinder Puzzle your task is to find the right path to collect all the stars on the field and safely arrive the target zone.
Are you able to always collect all stars?

This game is really good to train your brain with more and more complex levels.

How to play

You start with some easy levels, that explains you the base functions of the game.
After these levels, the levels starting to be more complex and harder to collect all stars.
You have to think about the right pathes, letting the car drive from where it's placed to the target field.
In higher levels you need to collect more stars to be able to play the next level.

The game could be played only with mouse and has several settings for graphics and volume.
